sentence.Network_en: Each room is distinctively decorated with light, bright colors and floral prints.
sentence.Network_cn: 每个房间都以淡雅或鲜艳的颜色和印花图案装饰成独特的风格。

sentence.Network_en: He has a distinctively sinuous way of walking.
sentence.Network_cn: 他走路扭来扭去，很有特点。

entry.tran: 独特的;特别的;有特色的
entry.def: Something that is distinctive has a special quality or feature which makes it easily recognizable and different from other things of the same type.

sentences.sentence: "the distinctively conservative district of the county"
